gif.alt: A video showing how to create a variable in Scratch

scratch-create-var-step-1.step_text: Go to the data group in the Scripts tab.

scratch-create-var-step-2.step_text: Click on the "make a variable" button.
scratch-create-var-step-2.alt: Location of the make a variable button

scratch-create-var-step-3.step_text:
Choose whether the variable is only available to this sprite (local) or all sprites (global).

Note: we will discuss global vs. local variables in detail later.

scratch-create-var-step-4.step_text: The variable is now available to set and use in the data menu!
scratch-create-var-step-4.alt: Show the ready to use variable in the menu
